messages.message: @tony.shi creating a new thread for this

I don't have this issue...can you try doing:

```rm -f /etc/secrets/keys/signing/token_private_key.pem
rm -f /etc/secrets/keys/signing/token_public_key.pem```
And then rerunning it?
Also: link me your sandbox :slightly_smiling_face:
https://https--tonybackend-instabase.instabase.site.sandboxes.run/
Huh, that's a wierd one! I ran those RMs in your sandbox, let's see if that unsticks it.

Was hanging on updating kubernetes; I've killed it and tried restarting. App tasks is currently failing to start. Taking a closer look

```✔ select the only one - DAEMON:celery-app-tasks@instabase
make: Entering directory '/home/owner/instabase/distributed-tasks/celery/app-tasks'
mkdir -p /home/owner/instabase/distributed-tasks/celery/app-tasks/build/py
rm -f /home/owner/instabase/distributed-tasks/celery/app-tasks/build/pydeps.txt
rm -f /home/owner/instabase/distributed-tasks/celery/app-tasks/build/pythriftdeps.txt
rm -f /home/owner/instabase/distributed-tasks/celery/app-tasks/build/protodeps.txt
make -s list-deps >> /home/owner/instabase/distributed-tasks/celery/app-tasks/build/pydeps.txt
make[1]: python: No such file or directory
make[1]: *** [/home/owner/instabase/distributed-tasks/celery/app-tasks/../../../shared-utils/build-utils/shared/build-python.mk:85: list-deps] Error 127
make: *** [/home/owner/instabase/distributed-tasks/celery/app-tasks/../../../shared-utils/build-utils/shared/build-python.mk:113: copy-py-deps] Error 2
make: Leaving directory '/home/owner/instabase/distributed-tasks/celery/app-tasks'
make: Entering directory '/home/owner/instabase/distributed-tasks/celery/app-tasks'
mkdir -p /home/owner/instabase/distributed-tasks/celery/app-tasks/build/py
rm -f /home/owner/instabase/distributed-tasks/celery/app-tasks/build/pydeps.txt
rm -f /home/owner/instabase/distributed-tasks/celery/app-tasks/build/pythriftdeps.txt
rm -f /home/owner/instabase/distributed-tasks/celery/app-tasks/build/protodeps.txt
make -s list-deps >> /home/owner/instabase/distributed-tasks/celery/app-tasks/build/pydeps.txt
make[1]: python: No such file or directory
make[1]: *** [/home/owner/instabase/distributed-tasks/celery/app-tasks/../../../shared-utils/build-utils/shared/build-python.mk:85: list-deps] Error 127```
No python? Weird. When did you create your sandbox? I can sync w/ you tomorrow to get unblocked!

Great! Mind if I put something into your calendar? I'll take a closer look this evening myself as well.

I believe this sandbox was created a couple of months ago
Yeah, definitely. OK, it's weird that Python would stop working suddenly...anyway, we'll figure it out
Actually, I just spun up a new sandbox instead; Going to cancel the sync. Happy to dig deeper if we need to root cause this
OK, lmk if you get stuck!
Will do. Thanks!
I ran into this! :hand: halp
@Heymian I fixed the .pem issue by removing those directories. Did you run into the `python` issue too?
Have to look into why they are dirs and not files...
I didn’t run into the python issues (yet?)
Dumb question how do you go fix the directories? How do I get onto the machine?

Ah -- `cs ssh`, then:

```rm -rf /etc/secrets/keys/signing/token_private_key.pem
rm -rf /etc/secrets/keys/signing/token_public_key.pem```
Or:
ohhh thanks!!
